text: The “astounding rise” of #ADHD really took place between mid-1991 and 1993, as documented in my film #GenerationRx. That’s when there was a 734% increase (!!) in the prescribed use of #methylphenidate (#Ritalin) among children/teens. The #DEA even called out #Pharma— to no avail.
